reviewText:
I love top down racers and so many of the don't keep things pure enough.  The great thing about Eight Mini Racers is how pure the actual racing is.

I played multiple races against a friend and really had some fun races.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=624195306

There are sixteen tracks varying from a simple loop to some quite complex circuits that involve you crashing through tyre walls and weaving left and right.

I can imagine this is going to be a great example of for every player you add in the mix the game becomes amazingly more fun.  I can't imagine how great it would be with 6-8 friends!!  Obviously with it being local only, arranging this is going to only some can manage.  But four-players would still be awesome!

The price tag refelects the simplicity of the game but if you have some local friends that enjoy simple top-down racers this represents amazing value!

reviewText:
This is an awesome racing game!
Pros:
+ Simple and easy to catch on
+ Customizable controls
+ Great if you have friends to play it with/8 players total (Duh! It's in the title, Eight Mini Racers")
+ Has fun powerups and... powerdowns?
+ Has a ton of colors for each car

Cons:
- Only has one volume option (Master Volume)
- You can only connect by LAN (Local Connection)
- Only has 3 cars
- No AI racers for singleplayer
- Singleplayer gets repetative after a while since you're the only one on the track

Overall I rate it an 8/10
It's worth playing
date: and definitly worth the price! Again
hoursPlayed: so if you're looking for an online multiplayer option

reviewText:
Name: Eight Mini Racers
Developer: David Mulder
Release Date: 11th January 2016

Fun Local Multiplayer Racing Game
Eight Mini Racers is a small and fun 2D racing game which is focused on local multiplayer with no online play. It is entertaining for the most part with engaging gameplay to draw you in with very good controls and interesting multiplayer.

Features:

The game features a local multiplayer mode and no online play at all which can be annoying to players who do not have any means of playing on a LAN. The game also has very simple controls and a great visual feel that will attract gamers young and old. Singleplayer is also available, but it has no AI and gets very boring after about 10 minutes.

Pros:
Fun And Simple Gameplay
Customizable Controls
Enjoyable Multiplayer (Up To 8 Players)
Cool Powerups To Attack Opponents
Tons Of Colours To Customize Cars
Cons:
Only LAN Multiplayer Available
Only One Volume Option (Master Volume)
Only Three Cars Available
No AI Racers
Singleplayer Can Be Boring
Summary:

Eight Mini Racers is a small and interesting 2D racing game which is focused on local multiplayer. It can bring enjoyment to pretty much any age gamer and will provide a few hours of entertainment.

Rating:

6 / 10
